name: Hot Tub Stu
description:
Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space

Stu just wants to relax, but it's getting really crowded. Everyone wants their turn in the hot tub, and they need Stu’s helpful hand to keep them from exploding. Left-click to throw saline-filled syringes at your tub-mates’ pressure points so they don’t explode. Watch life unfold as you battle to keep everyone alive… Good luck!!! 💉💉💉🥔
